name: Wobbly Jungle
description: Wobbly Jungle demands the player's entire skill and dexterity across 60 diverse levels. This sidescroller impresses with its extraordinary design and will drive the player to the edge. Survival of the fittest!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Core2Duo 1.6 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Core i3 Series Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I've spent a little time with the game and feel that it's worth playing.

This game has a unique art style with cute creatures! A nice platformer that is challenging and not for those looking for something casual, even though it might seem like it. The game does well as a platformer as it has a lot of levels but that pretty much sums up the game. I believe more could've been done for the game, like a story for example (if there is a story then it's not shown properly and clearly).  Here is some gameplay from my YouTube channel:         YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  CUTE PINK CREATURES! // Let's Play // Wobbly Jungle
